casebody.data:
No. 11-412. City of Moundridge, Kansas, et al., Petitioners v. Exxon Mobil Corporation, et al. 565 U.S. 1073, 132 S. Ct. 777,

181 L. Ed. 2d 508,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8404. November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Justice Alito took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 409 Fed. Appx. 362.
